mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info( uCode, uEmail, uPassword, uNickname,uAtid, uBirth, uGender, uNation, uRegDate ) values (uCode_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{uEmail}, #{uPassword}, #{uNickname},#{uAtid} , TO_CHAR(#{uBirth},'yyyymmdd'), #{uGender}, #{uNation}, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') )
mapper.update: update user_info set uImage = #{uImage} where uCode = #{uCode}
update user_info set uLoginCount = uLoginCount+1 where uEmail = #{uEmail}
update user_info set uLoginCount = 0 where uEmail = #{uEmail}
update user_info set uPassword = #{uPassword} where uEmail = #{uEmail}
